functions.tag: {display:{Lore:['{"text":"The bodacious love story of a mole and a cicada "}']},title:"Moleman Fanfic",author:"Some random cicada",resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"I\'ve always had a fascination with mole men. Their thick, luscious whiskers and muscular forearms make my heart skip a beat. Ever since I can remember I\'ve fantasized about being with one, being swept off my feet and taken to far-off lands, passionately doing what mole men..."}','{"text":"and ladies do. So I just couldn\'t help myself when Eris joined the sap suckling club. He was a transfer student, but not just any transfer student, he was a mole man. He was everything I dreamed of and more. He was kind, loving, hunky, and he had a fat badonkadonk. "}','{"text":"I couldn\'t stop thinking about him, and how many babies we\'d have. Can Moles and Cicadas even have babies? Never mind that, we were meant to be. As I was daydreaming about the man of my future offspring I heard a knock on the door. I was frightened, I had been..."}','{"text":"so caught up in my moley fantasy I was left alone in the sap suckling labs! \\"Whho--who is it?\\" I asked timidly. The door slowly slid open and a manly figure leaned confidently against the wall. \\"Just me,\\" said Eris as his dreamy eyes pierced my soul. "}','{"text":"I passed out. \\nI awoke in the arms of what I thought was an angel. \\"Are you alright?\\" Eris whispered. My heart began to pound as I thought to myself \\"What does he think of me? Did I ruin my chances? Will I ever be good enough for him?\\" Before I could say anything, Eris..."}','{"text":"...gently brushed the away sap dripping down my forehead. My mind was racing. His molish testosterone filled my nostrils, causing me to pull him closer. \\"Big chungus,\\" I whispered lovingly into his ear. "}']}
